sections.title: Why build your own order and delivery system?
sections.content:
In today's competitive food service landscape, relying on off-the-shelf platforms for order and delivery can be costly and restrictive. These third-party solutions often come with high commissions, limited customization, and a disconnect from your brand identity. Building your own system empowers you to control the entire customer journey, from order placement to delivery.

With AI-powered development tools, custom solutions are no longer just for large chains. You can now develop a system that perfectly fits your menu, operational flow, and specific customer needs, all while avoiding recurring fees and strengthening your direct customer relationships.

sections.title: The case for a custom restaurant solution
sections.content:
## The pitfalls of generic platforms

Many restaurants depend on popular food delivery apps or generic POS systems for their online orders and deliveries. While convenient, these often lead to:

- **High commission fees:** Eating into your profit margins with every order.
- **Loss of customer data:** You don't own the customer relationship or their valuable ordering history.
- **Limited branding:** Your brand gets lost amidst countless others on a generic marketplace.
- **Inflexible operations:** Forced to adapt your kitchen flow to rigid software, not the other way around.
- **Service disruptions:** Dependence on third-party reliability for your core business operations.

## Why a tailored solution triumphs

The ability to build a custom order and delivery system provides unparalleled advantages:

### Maximize your profits

Eliminate hefty commission fees from third-party aggregators. Every order placed through your system is pure profit, allowing you to invest more in your food, staff, or marketing.

### Own your customer relationships

Gather valuable customer data, understand their preferences, and build direct relationships through personalized offers and communication. This data is critical for loyalty programs and targeted marketing.

### Seamless operational flow

Design the system to match your kitchen's unique workflow, from order reception to food prep and dispatch. Reduce errors, improve speed, and ensure your staff works efficiently.

### Reflect your brand, perfectly

Your app or website will be an extension of your restaurant's brand, from visual design to the ordering experience. Provide a consistent, high-quality touchpoint that reinforces your identity.

### Unmatched flexibility and scalability

Easily adapt to changing menus, special promotions, new delivery zones, or increased demand. Your system grows and evolves with your business, without needing vendor permission or expensive upgrades.

## Real-world impact

Imagine a custom system that allows:

**A local pizzeria** to manage peak hour orders, assign delivery routes efficiently, and send SMS updates to customers on their pizza's journey.

**A gourmet food truck** to offer pre-orders for specific locations, manage a limited daily menu, and send notifications when they arrive.

**A multi-location cafe chain** to centralize order management, track delivery performance across all branches, and offer unified loyalty points.

## The Kliv advantage for food service

Kliv's AI-powered platform makes custom software development accessible for restaurants of all sizes:

- **Describe your needs:** Use simple language to explain how you want your system to work.
- **Rapid iteration:** Build, test, and refine your order and delivery process quickly.
- **Integration ready:** Easily connect with existing POS systems, payment gateways, and delivery services.
- **Control and ownership:** You own the code and the data, ensuring long-term flexibility and security.

Don't let generic platforms dictate your business. Build a system that gives you control, saves you money, and delights your customers.

sections.title: Order & delivery system ideas to get you started

items.description: Develop a direct online ordering portal for pickup and local delivery.
items.prompt: Create a web application where customers can view my full menu, place pickup or delivery orders, choose a time slot, and pay online. Include an admin panel for managing orders and kitchen prep statuses.
items.title: Direct Online Ordering & Kitchen Display System

items.description: Optimize internal delivery routing and driver management.
items.prompt: Build a mobile app for delivery drivers that shows assigned orders, optimal routes, customer contact information, and allows status updates (e.g., 'On the way', 'Delivered'). Sync with the main order system.
items.title: Driver Management & Tracking App

items.description: Handle catering and large group orders with specific logistics.
items.prompt: Design a system for managing large catering orders, including custom menus, delivery scheduling for specific dates/times, and invoicing features for corporate clients. Include a way to manage ingredient inventory for these events.
items.title: Catering Order & Logistics Platform

items.description: Manage subscription meal plans with recurring deliveries.
items.prompt: Develop a system for offering subscription meal plans. Allow customers to choose weekly meals, manage their subscription, and automate billing. Include a backend to generate weekly meal prep lists and delivery manifests.
items.title: Meal Subscription Management

items.description: Streamline customer feedback and issue resolution.
items.prompt: Create a module where customers can rate their orders and delivery experience, report issues, and attach photos. Implement a ticketing system for the restaurant staff to respond and resolve complaints efficiently.
items.title: Customer Feedback & Support Portal

sections.title: Ways to enhance your order & delivery system

items.prompt: Add a loyalty program module where customers earn points for every purchase, which can then be redeemed for discounts or free items.
items.title: Integrate Loyalty Program

items.prompt: Implement dynamic pricing based on peak hours or ingredient availability, as well as automatic promotional discounts for first-time orders or specific days.
items.title: Add Dynamic Pricing & Promotions

items.prompt: Connect with an inventory management system to automatically update stock levels as ingredients are used and notify staff when items are low.
items.title: Link to Inventory Management

items.prompt: Develop a chatbot that can answer common customer questions, assist with order placement, and provide real-time order status updates via the website or messaging apps.
items.title: Add AI Chatbot for Customer Service

items.prompt: Create an analytics dashboard showing sales trends, popular menu items, delivery performance metrics, and customer acquisition costs.
items.title: Build Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard

items.prompt: Add a feature for customers to customize their orders with special instructions or dietary preferences, which are then clearly visible to kitchen staff.
items.title: Enable Advanced Order Customization

items.prompt: Implement real-time GPS tracking for delivery drivers, visible to both customers and restaurant staff.
items.title: Add Live Delivery Tracking

items.description: Allow customers to browse menus, select items, and place orders easily.
items.title: Online Ordering Interface

items.description: Efficiently manage incoming orders, track status, and dispatch for delivery.
items.title: Kitchen Order Management

items.description: Securely process online payments via various methods.
items.title: Integrated Payment Gateway

items.description: Assign, track, and optimize delivery routes for drivers.
items.title: Delivery Management Module

items.description: Send automated SMS or email updates to customers about their order status.
items.title: Automated Customer Notifications

items.answer: Building a basic order and delivery system with Kliv can take as little as a few days, depending on the complexity of features you require. Advanced systems with multiple integrations might take a few weeks.
items.question: How quickly can I build my restaurant's system?

items.answer: No coding is required. Kliv's AI allows you to describe your desired features in plain language, and it generates the core application for you to customize further.
items.question: Do I need technical expertise to build this?

items.answer: Yes, custom systems can integrate with most existing POS, inventory, and accounting software, as well as third-party APIs for mapping or real-time tracking services.
items.question: Can this system integrate with my existing POS or other tools?

items.answer: Unlike third-party platforms that charge ongoing commission fees, a custom system built with Kliv is typically a one-time development cost, leading to significant savings over time.
items.question: How does the cost compare to third-party delivery platforms?

items.answer: Absolutely. Since you own the system, you have complete flexibility to modify features, update menus, adjust pricing, or scale operations as your business evolves, without external vendor limitations.
items.question: Can I easily update or expand my system after launch?

items.answer: You own 100% of the code and customer data. You decide where it's hosted and how it's managed, providing full control and data privacy.
items.question: Who owns the customer data and the application itself?

items.answer: Yes, you can implement robust security measures tailored to your needs, including secure payment processing, data encryption, and regular security audits, often exceeding generic platform standards.
